text:
Hi team, not sure who to ask, any recommendations appreciated.
I’ve built an app, for a customer, that calculates a Contact’s Age, From their Date of Birth. The app also updates the Contacts Age every year, on their birthday.
*My questions is:* Would a Birthday & Age App be allowed in the Marketplace? (assuming you could do the same job with custom code in Ops Hub Enterprise & Marketing Hub)

I don't see a reason it wouldn't be allowed. Could use the crm card API for displaying it. Or could use a field.
Haven't tried but you may also be able to do this with a calculated field.

As long as you follow best practices and use only the necessary scopes id think it should be allowed.

Thank you <@U7SL518D6>, I’ve been meaning to launch the App for years and I finally got round to refactoring over the weekend. It’s now super clean and lightweight. I will submit it for marketplace review
